verses.name: Genesis 50:14
verses.text: And Joseph returned into Egypt, he, and his brethren, and all that went up with him to bury his father, after he had buried his father.

verses.name: Genesis 50:15
verses.text: And when Joseph’s brethren saw that their father was dead, they said, Joseph will peradventure hate us, and will certainly requite us all the evil which we did unto him.

verses.name: Genesis 50:16
verses.text: And they sent a messenger unto Joseph, saying, Thy father did command before he died, saying,
